sqlMap.select: SELECT key, text FROM BITE_TEXT ORDER BY 1 ASC
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BITE_TEXT SET text = #value# WHERE key = #key#
sqlMap.select: SELECT key, text FROM BITE_TEXT WHERE key in ( SELECT key FROM BITE_TEXT WHERE dbms_lob.instr(LOWER(text), LOWER(#value#)) > 0 UNION SELECT key FROM BITE_TEXT WHERE LOWER(key) like LOWER('%$value$%') ) ORDER BY 1 ASC
